Literature.Title: Enhancement of the antimicrobial activity and selectivity of GNU7 against Gram-negative bacteria by fusion with LPS-targeting peptide.
Literature.Author: Kim H, Jang JH, Kim SC, Cho JH

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:18% Hemolysis=8 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:18% Killing=8 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus ATCC 10240(MIC=0.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 15752(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli KCTC 2223(MIC=0.5µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 2370(MIC=1µM)
